title: Can't download League wont get past Visual C++ to instal......
body: I have never had this problem but I just got a brand new Desktop and now I am havving issues. Please someone help I just want to play LEAGUE!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Some Windows 10 PC's need to be run through Windows updates and require a fresh install of C++ from [this link.](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
